CustomField.formula: (Lead_Source1__r.Lead_Score__c) + (IF ( ISBLANK(Waiver_Code__c) , 0, 5)) + (IF ( ISBLANK(Walk_In_scheduled_Date__c) , 0, 5)) + (IF ( ISPICKVAL(When_is_Student_Seeking__c, "Immediate"), 5, 0))+ (IF ( ISPICKVAL(When_is_Student_Seeking__c, "1 Week"), 4, 0)) + (IF ( ISPICKVAL(When_is_Student_Seeking__c, "1 Month"), 3, 0)) + (IF ( ISPICKVAL(When_is_Student_Seeking__c, "3 Months"), 2, 0)) + (IF ( ISPICKVAL(When_is_Student_Seeking__c, "5 Months"), 1, 0)) + (IF ( ISPICKVAL(When_is_Student_Seeking__c, "Not Sure"), 0, 0))
CustomField.label: Lead Score
